sectionFirstPageDescription: A list of our current recruitment-processes, here you can see their information, such as, full name, age and address. You will also find their contact-information, which is an e-mail. They are also presented with an picture. And most important you can see in which state they are in in our recruitment-process.
formFirstPageDescription: At the case of a new recruitee will be relevant you can add them in the system to track their progress,
sectionFormPageDescription: This is where you can add a recruitee with the form below.
